summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of SOUTH ALASKA STREET, from 39th Avenue South to 41st Avenue South, and a certain other street and an avenue; by constructing water mains and installing fire hydrants together with the necessary appurtenances, in accord with Resolution 27091 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating Local Improvement District No. 6740 and providing for payment of the cost and expense of the improvement by special assessments upon property within the district by payment by bonds.
